channel.title: Anyone Know how to make this?
channel.description:
I am making a website where u can buy runescape gold.
Well I want it to have this in it http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/3850/dfhoi8.png from - http://www.virsale.com/games/runescape/runescape.asp
But when u press "Buy" I want it to go to my paypal which is gtech@gamerz-elite.com ... and when they fully sent the money I want the for of how much they bought and their character name sent to my email so i know who bought what (my email - gtech@gamerz-elite.com).
Can someone please make this for me.. like an html code or something?

item.title: Anyone Know how to make this?
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

Isn’t their a program called winhtt track that like gets every page of the server or something. Google that and see if it does.

Read full topic
